about_the_game:
Arcana is an Action Roguelike that delivers pure, unadulterated power. Unleash the full force of Fire, Frost, and Arcane magic to decimate waves of undead, demons, and ghouls in a heart-pounding battle through exciting, handcrafted environments.

So whether you're summoning a powerful Meteor Shower, freezing enemies in place with a devastating ice storm, or channeling Arcane Devastation, Arcana is the ultimate power fantasy for anyone who’s ever dreamed of becoming a master wizard!

Features

  • 30+ Devastating Spells: Wield an arsenal of magic, each spell offering transformative 3-5 upgrades that unlock unique playstyles.

  • 120+ Passive Effects: Craft your perfect build with abilities that synergize in creative ways, from explosive combos to high-speed tactical maneuvers.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Conquer three unique bosses across seven levels, each presenting new challenges and opportunities to flex your magical prowess.

  • Dynamic Difficulty Levels: Progress through Easy, Normal, Hard, Nightmare, and the ultimate test—Infinite Mode—where enemies grow stronger with every victory.

Everything is Unlocked from the Start: Dive straight into the action with all upgrades unlocked from the start. Your skill and strategy are the only paths to glory.

Unleash your Magic

Leap through mysterious portals and confront relentless hordes in your quest to reclaim the Arcana. Harness the elements of Fire, Frost, and Arcane:

  • Fire: Incinerate enemies with critical strikes and persistent burns.

  • Frost: Control the battlefield by freezing foes and reducing incoming damage.

  • Arcane: Manipulate mana for devastating bursts of power.

Every battle earns you experience, granting you levels and upgrades to shape your wizardry. Learn new spells, rank up existing ones to unlock new play styles, or gain passives that redefine how you approach combat. From summoning fiery meteors to crafting an icebound fortress, the possibilities are endless.


Ultimate Power Awaits

In Arcana, it's not just about survival—it's about thriving amidst chaos. Build your wizard from a nimble arcane rogue to an unstoppable pyromancer. Test your limits, climb the leaderboards, and see how far your mastery of magic can take you.

Are you ready to wield ultimate power? Wishlist Arcana today!
